titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: ADULT MENTAL HEALTH CARE CLUSTER CODE (INITIAL) - Permitted Codes

stentry.p: Care Cluster 9 - Cluster Under Review - Note: This CARE CLUSTER is under review and should not be used.
